FuncDef:
The qos statistics ifg enable command configures the device to count the inter-frame gap and preamble of Ethernet frames when the device collects traffic statistics.
The undo qos statistics ifg enable command restores the default configuration. The qos statistics ifg enable command configures the device to count the inter-frame gap and preamble of Ethernet frames when the device collects traffic statistics. The undo qos statistics ifg enable command restores the default configuration. By default, the frame gap and preamble of Ethernet frames are not included in the traffic statistics.
